description:
Finity is the web3 design system for functional dApps, created by Polygon and built with Cope.Studio.


With Finity, we simplify design processes and help dApps build high-quality interfaces and experiences for the web3 ecosystem.


The freedom you get with the customisations allows you to reflect your branding guidelines on everything from entire pages to a single button - and it is entirely free!


ðŸ“ž Reach out to us!

Contact us at finity@cope.studio or hit us up with a Calendly office-hours booking. We are more than happy to help you onboard your dApps onto the Polygon ecosystem.
